author: yoavs
msg: Addressed Bugzilla 30762.  Risky fix I think, but better than the current broken behavior.

author: remm
msg: - Set the notes even when caching. This is harmless from a performance standpoint, but since the principal might not be serializable
it would cause issues with SSO and clustering.
- Yoav, do you agree on porting this to 5.0.x ?

msg: Add some notes on building the code under Eclipse. Based on several

author: remm

- Remove DefaultContext and Logger from the list.
